nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_683
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He spoke confidently, which impressed me most.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_684
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: My father is so forgetful that he is always looking for his keys.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_685
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I'm very grateful to you for all the help you have given me.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_686
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The bad light, coupled with the wet ground, made driving very difficult.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_687
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Being starved of funds, they had to cancel their plan to start a business.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_688
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: They always lean on us whenever they are in trouble.
